fields.title: DEMO Exposure Model for Algeria
fields.abstract:
This model was developed as part of the Global Earthquake Risk Model
The database contain residential, industrial and commercial building stock at wilaya level
For further details about the model, data sources and methodology adopted herein,
please visit https://www.globalquakemodel.org/gem.
fields.purpose: Exposure data for Algeria at administrative level 1
